util.OSProcess module¶

Standalone operations on based on OS processes

util.OSProcess.close_running_process(process_name)¶

This will handle the termination of running processes passed in the list E.g. process_detail = get_processid_by_name(‘chrome’, ‘conhost’, ‘pycharm64.exe’, ‘WinMergeU’)

Parameters:process_name (list) – list of process to be terminated
util.OSProcess.get_processid_by_name(process_name)¶

Get a list of all the PIDs of the running process whose name contains the given string processName

Parameters:process_name (str) – windows process name
Returns:list of running process information with process_name
Return type:list
util.OSProcess.kill_process_tree(pid, sig=15, include_parent=True, timeout=None, on_terminate=None)¶

Kill a process tree (including grandchildren) with signal “sig” and return a (gone, still_alive) tuple. “on_terminate”, if specified, is a callback function which is called as soon as a child terminates.

Parameters:
  • pid (str) – Process id of process
  • sig (str) – Optional argument for Termination Signals
  • include_parent (bool) – Optional if parent process to be included
  • on_terminate (str) – Optional for callback which is a function which gets called every time a process terminates (a Process instance is passed as callback argument)
  • timeout (float) – Process wait timeout
Returns:

status of terminating the process
Return type:

bool

util.ProgressBar module¶

Maintain Progress bar

class util.ProgressBar.ProgressBar¶

Native progress bar, and unused. If bug is not fixed in tqdm have to move to this

class util.ProgressBar.ProgressBar2(desc, total, position=None, leave=True, ascii=True, unit=' byte', colour=True)¶

Progress bar using tqdm. Has bug as per GitHub open issue list

color_bars = ['\x1b[30m', '\x1b[31m', '\x1b[32m', '\x1b[33m', '\x1b[34m', '\x1b[35m', '\x1b[36m', '\x1b[37m']¶

util.XmlParser module¶

class util.XmlParser.CommentedTreeBuilder(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: xml.etree.ElementTree.TreeBuilder

Class to handle xml comments

  • https://gist.github.com/jamiejackson/a37e8d3dacb33b2dcbc1

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Class to handle duplicate element in xml

make_emelemt_string(tag, attribute)¶

This will construct an proper xml element as a string :param tag: xml tag :type tag: str :param attribute: attributes of xml tag :type attribute: list :return: the xml block of the element with attribute :rtype: str
